markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs=""
>
[Competitive Eater](/Feats.aspx?ID=3889) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178)

**Prerequisites**
[Glutton for Flesh](/Feats.aspx?ID=3511)

</column>

---

Gorging on flesh after your stomach is full fortifies you, making you hardy enough to withstand more punishment. When you become fully satiated, you gain an amount of temporary Hit Points equal to 10 + your level.
name: Competitive Eater
